Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Facility Name
Purpose: used for referral of patients; total isolation beds can be derived using these variables

DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Health Facility Code. Unique identifier for the health facility based on the National Health Facility Registry

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Date of submission

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of ICU beds with or without negative pressure in your facility that are currently occupied by suspect, probable, or confirmed COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your DEDICATED ICU beds for Suspect, Probable, and Confirmed COVID-19 patients (as of 8am today), what is the # of occupied?
Purpose: used for referral of patients; total ICU beds can be derived using these variables

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of ICU beds with or without negative pressure in your facility that are currently vacant and available for use by suspect, probable, or confirmed COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your DEDICATED ICU beds for Suspect, Probable, and Confirmed COVID-19 patients (as of 8am today), what is the # of vacant and available?
Purpose: used for referral of patients; total ICU beds can be derived using these variables

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of beds in converted wards/units dedicated for confirmed COVID-19 cases in your facility that are currently occupied. Wards are not allowed for Suspect or Probable cases (PUIs) and should not included.
Question Format: Out of your beds in converted ward/s DEDICATED for CONFIRMED COVID-19 cases (as of 8am today), what is the # of occupied?
Purpose: used for referral of patients; total beds in COVID positive wards can be derived using these variables

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of beds in converted wards/units dedicated for confirmed COVID-19 cases in your facility that are currently vacant and available for use. Wards are not allowed for Suspect or Probable cases (PUIs) and should not included.
Question Format: Out of your beds in converted ward/s DEDICATED for CONFIRMED COVID-19 cases (as of 8am today), what is the # of vacant and available?
Purpose: used for referral of patients; proxy for number of intubated patients; total mech vents can be derived using these variables

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of isolation beds and converted/makeshift isolation beds based on DOH standardsin your facility that are currently occupied by suspect, probable, or confirmed COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your DEDICATED Isolation beds and converted/makeshift isolation beds (excluding ICU beds) for Suspect, Probable, and Confirmed COVID-19 patients (as of 8am today), what is the # of occupied?
Purpose: used for referral of patients; total beds in COVID positive wards can be derived using these variables

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of isolation beds and converted/makeshift isolation beds based on DOH standards in your facility that are currently vacant and available for use.
Question Format: Out of your DEDICATED Isolation beds and converted/makeshift isolation beds (excluding ICU beds) for Suspect, Probable, and Confirmed COVID-19 patients (as of 8am today), what is the # of vacant and available?
Purpose: used for referral of patients; proxy for number of intubated patients; total mech vents can be derived using these variables

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of mechanical ventilators in your facility, whether outsourced or in-house, that are currently occupied by PUIs (Suspect or Probable patients) or Confirmed COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your DEDICATED mechanical ventilators for Suspect, Probable, and Confirmed COVID-19 patients (as of 8am today), what is the # of occupied?
Purpose: used for referral of patients; total isolation beds can be derived using these variables

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of mechanical ventilators that are vacant and available for use by PUIs (Suspect or Probable patients) or Confirmed COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your DEDICATED mechanical ventilators for Suspect, Probable, and Confirmed COVID-19 patients (as of 8am today), what is the # of vacant and available?
Purpose: used for referral of patients; total isolation beds can be derived using these variables

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of ICU beds with or without negative pressure in your facility that are currently vacant and available for use by Non-COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your ICU beds for patients that are not for Suspect, Probable nor Confirmed COVID-19 cases (as of 8am today), what is the # of vacant and available?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of ICU beds with or without negative pressure in your facility that are currently occupied by Non-COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your ICU beds for patients that are not for Suspect, Probable nor Confirmed COVID-19 cases (as of 8am today), what is the # of occupied?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of non-ICU beds (including wards and isolation beds and all other non-ICU beds) dedicated for Non-COVID-19 cases in your facility that are currently vacant and available for use
Question Format: Out of your non-ICU beds for patients that are not for Suspect, Probable nor Confirmed COVID-19 cases (as of 8am today), what is the # of vacant and available?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of non-ICU beds (including wards and isolation beds and all other non-ICU beds) dedicated for Non-COVID-19 cases in your facility that are currently occupied
Question Format: Out of your non-ICU beds for patients that are not for Suspect, Probable nor Confirmed COVID-19 cases (as of 8am today), what is the # of occupied?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of mechanical ventilators in your facility, whether outsourced or in-house, that are vacant and available by Non-COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your mechanical ventilators for patients that are not for Suspect, Probable nor Confirmed COVID-19 cases (as of 8am today), what is the # of vacant and available?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect BedTracker v4 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of mechanical ventilators in your facility, whether outsourced or in-house, that are currently occupied by Non-COVID-19 patients
Question Format: Out of your mechanical ventilators for patients that are not for Suspect, Probable nor Confirmed COVID-19 cases (as of 8am today), what is the # of occupied?

Description: Name of the institution certified by the Department of Health to perform COVID-19 Testing

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Refer to the actual number of all unique individuals with positive results that are released from 6pm the previous day to 6pm of the reporting date.
Question Format: How many unique individuals tested negative on (reporting date)?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Refer to the actual number of all unique individuals with negative results that are released from 6pm the previous day to 6pm of the reporting date.
Question Format: How many unique individuals tested positive on (reporting date)?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: The sum of all unique individuals tested (positive+negative) with results that are released from 6pm the previous day to 6pm of the reporting date.
Question Format: How many total unique individuals were tested on (date) regardless of results?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Number of all specimens with equivocal results that are released from 6pm the previous day to 6pm of the reporting date.

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Number of all specimens with invalid results that are released from 6pm the previous day to 6pm of the reporting date.

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: The total specimens processed with results (positive, negative, equivocal or invalid) released from 6pm the previous day to 6pm of the reporting date.
Question Format: How many specimens/samples were tested and have results for COVID-19 on (date)?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: The total number of unique individuals who underwent COVID-19 testing, regardless of result, accumulated since the start of operations in the laboratory. One individual, with 2 or more specimen results will only be counted once.
Question Format: What is the total number of unique individuals who underwent COVID-19 testing, regardless of result from the start of operations to (date)?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: The total number of unique individuals with a positive result after COVID-19 testing using the appropriate confirmatory test (ex. RT-PCR)
Question Format: What is the total number of unique individuals with a positive result after COVID-19 testing using the appropriate confirmatory test (ex. RT-PCR) from the start of operations to (date)?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: The total number of unique individuals with a negative result after COVID-19 testing
Question Format: What is the total number of unique individuals with a negative result after COVID-19 testing from the start of operations to (date)?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Sum of all specimens tested with validated results from the start of laboratory operation up to the reporting date
Question Format: How many specimens were tested in total from the start of operation up to (date)?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Total Number of cumulative positive individuals as percent of cumulative unique individuals

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Total Number of cumulative negative individuals as percent of cumulative unique individuals

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Remaining COVID-19 tests that can be conducted by the health facility or laboratory based on the PCR testing kits they currently have. For GeneXpert labs, this refers to the remaining number of cartridges on hand.
Question Format: How many COVID-19 tests can still be conducted by the health facility or laboratory with the PCR test kits you have?

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Number of samples without validated results released within 48 hours after receipt

Sheet: Testing Aggregates
Description: Records marked as "For Review" may have missing or conflicting information (ex: Positive Individuals > Unique Individuals) as reported by the labs and are undergoing verification.

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of functional isolation beds/rooms (with walls and ceiling to completely enclose each room for suspect and probable cases) in your facility that are currently vacant and available for use. Beds are classified either as isolation beds OR as cohorted beds.
Question Format: As of 8:00 AM today, how many functional isolation beds/rooms (with walls and ceiling to completely enclose each room for contact, suspect, and probable cases) that are currently vacant and available (do not include cohorted beds)?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of  functional isolation beds/rooms (with walls and ceiling to completely enclose each room for suspect and probable cases) in your facility that are currently occupied.
Question Format: As of 8:00 AM today, how many functional isolation beds/rooms (with walls and ceiling to completely enclose each room for contact, suspect, and probable cases) that are currently occupied (do not include cohorted beds) ?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of functional cohorted beds (non-enclosed space for confirmed cases) in the facility that are currently vacant and available for use. Beds are classified either as isolation beds OR as cohorted beds.
Question Format: As of 8:00 AM today, how many functional cohorted beds (non-enclosed space for confirmed cases only) are currently vacant and available (do not include isolated beds)?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of functional cohorted beds (non-enclosed space for confirmed cases) in the facility that are currently occupied
Question Format: As of 8:00 AM today, how many functional cohorted beds (non-enclosed space for confirmed cases only) are currently occupied (do not include isolated beds)?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of doctors CURRENTLY in quarantine at home or in a facility due to COVID-19 exposure (close contact, suspect, probable, confirmed)
Question Format: Out of YOUR FACILITY'S health workers CURRENTLY under quarantine at home or in a facility due to COVID-19 (close contact, suspect, probable, confirmed), as of 8:00 AM today, what is the # of doctors?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of doctors CURRENTLY in quarantine at home or in a facility due to COVID-19 exposure (close contact, suspect, probable, confirmed)
Question Format: Out of YOUR FACILITY'S health workers CURRENTLY under quarantine at home or in a facility due to COVID-19 (close contact, suspect, probable, confirmed), as of 8:00 AM today, what is the # of nurses?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of nurses CURRENTLY in quarantine at home or in a facility due to COVID-19 exposure (close contact, suspect, probable, confirmed)
Question Format: Out of YOUR FACILITY'S health workers CURRENTLY under quarantine at home or in a facility due to COVID-19 (close contact, suspect, probable, confirmed), as of 8:00 AM today, what is the # of other staff?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of other staff CURRENTLY in quarantine at home or in a facility due to COVID-19 exposure (close contact, suspect, probable, confirmed)
Question Format: Out of YOUR FACILITY'S health workers CURRENTLY admitted as a suspect, probable, or confirmed COVID-19 case (as of 8:00 AM today), what is the # of doctors?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of nurses CURRENTLY admitted in a hospital as a suspect, probable, or confirmed COVID-19 case
Question Format: Out of YOUR FACILITY'S health workers CURRENTLY admitted as a suspect, probable, or confirmed COVID-19 case (as of 8:00 AM today), what is the # of nurses?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Daily Report
Description: Total number of other staff CURRENTLY admitted in a hospital as a suspect, probable, or confirmed COVID-19 case
Question Format: Out of YOUR FACILITY'S health workers CURRENTLY admitted as a suspect, probable, or confirmed COVID-19 case (as of 8:00 AM today), what is the # of other staff?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Baseline Report
Description: IPC measure on governance, facility manager
Question Format: Does your facility have the following Infection Prevention and Control (IPC) measures...

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Baseline Report
Description: IPC measure on safety governance at the managerial level
Possible Responses: Sanitation Officer (leads the waste management in the facility)?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Baseline Report
Description: IPC measure on safety governance at the operational level
Possible Responses: Designated IPC officer (nurse or physician) who will take the role to oversee the adherence of IPC protocols per shift?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Baseline Report
Description: IPC measure on engineering control for zoning
Possible Responses: Presence of zoning within the facility (separate clean, buffer and contaminated zones)?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Baseline Report
Description: IPC measure on administrative conrol for patient placement
Possible Responses: Correct patient placement (cohorted for confirmed, individual rooms for suspect, probable, and close contact)?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Baseline Report
Description: IPC measure on engineering control for specimen collection
Possible Responses: Specimen collection area that well-lighted, ventilated, separate and partitioned from other areas?

Sheet: DOH Data Collect TTMFTracker v1 - Baseline Report
Description: Total number of beds being set up or fixed
Question Format: As of May 8, 2020, how many beds are still unavailable but are being set up or fixed?
Possible Responses: Ex. still being set up, fixed, or undergoing maintenance
